Methods in ex.train with parameters of type DataSource

static int SampleSetFactory.addToSampleSet(DataSource src, uep.data.SampleSet sset, byte filter)
          Appends all samples from this data source to the given SampleSet, respecting the specified filter.
 void SampleClassifier.classifyDataSet(DataSource src, byte featureFilter, boolean cache, int nbest)
          Classifies all samples in the given dataset, sets their class attribute accordingly, updates class information in the data source.
 void SampleClassifier.initEmptyDataSet(DataSource src, byte featureFilter)
          Creates an empty dataset of samples with feature vector based on DataSource.
static uep.data.SampleSet SampleSetFactory.initEmptyDataSet(DataSource src, java.lang.String name)
          Creates a new, empty data source, weighted or not weighted as required by the DataSource, and invokes updateDataSetFeatures() on it.
static uep.data.SampleSet SampleSetFactory.initEmptyDataSet(DataSource src, java.lang.String name, boolean weighted, byte featureFilter)
          Creates a new, empty data source and invokes updateDataSetFeatures() on it.
static void SampleSetFactory.updateDataSetFeatures(DataSource src, byte featureFilter, uep.data.SampleSet dataSet)
          Clears dataSet and sets its features according to DataSource and featureFilter.
